Join with Invite Code

Play Blackjack 1v1 against another player! First player to 21 wins, but go over and you lose.

• Create a game and invite friends

• Find an opponent for quick play

• Join a game with an invite code

Blackjack 1v1

Create a game or find an opponent to start playing

Game Objective

Get a hand value closer to 21 than your opponent without going over. If you exceed 21, you "bust" and lose the game.

Card Values

2-10: Face value
J, Q, K: 10 points
Ace: 1 or 11

Gameplay

  1. Both players receive two cards to start
  2. On your turn, choose to "Hit" (draw another card) or "Stand" (end your turn)
  3. Your opponent will then take their turn
  4. The player closest to 21 without busting wins
  5. Equal scores result in a tie
